name: Solitaire Farm Village
description:
The ultimate solitaire card game - Enjoy multiple solitaire card games for free!
Expand your farm and make the village rich!
Expand your village by playing solitaire games!

■■■■■Features■■■■■

■ My favorite solitaire card game!
- Enjoy 4-types : Klondike, Spider, Pyramid, FreeCell card games!

■ Grow your farm and village to make more money!
- Grapes, oranges, wheat farming and also milking cows! Collect extra coins every time you build a new construction.

■ Create your own deck!
- Choose designs for the back and front of the card to make your own unique looking card deck.

■ Awesome Combo Bonuses!
- Stars will rain down when you do a combo!

!Warning! Game data is not saved automatically.
Please make sure to save the data!
Settings -> Save Data -> Connect
